snippet.title: Polymega Gameplays - Arcade Party Pak [PlayStation - PAL]
snippet.description:
Games are getting more and more sophisticated, ever more intricate and detailed and the graphics and sound better. This generally means more enthralling game-play generally. But don't you ever want to relive those glory days of early arcade platform action again? Ah, things were so much simpler back then, but just as much fun.

Arcade Party Pak gives you six chances to reminisce with the golden era hits 720, the skate board stunt game, Rampage with its city destroying monsters, the puzzler Klax, Toobin', the river racer, the televised shoot-em-up Smash TV and Super Sprint, the racing classic.

Arcade Party Pak, Rampage, 720, Klax, Toobin', Smash TV, Super Sprint (C) Warner Bros. Discovery
Published by Midway Home Entertainment
Developed by Digital Eclipse
BIOS Used: Polymega BIOS

#retrogames #retrogaming #polymega #polymegagameplays #ps1 #psx #psone #playstation #arcade #arcadepartypak #digitaleclipse #midway #rampage #klax #toobin #smashtv #720 #supersprint 

FUN FACT: Three of the six games on Arcade Party Pak do not function properly on the backwards-compatible PlayStation 2. The incompatible games are 720º, Toobin', and Super Sprint. Also, the PAL version you see here was released in 2001, two years after its North American release.
